gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Raptors 121, Heat 97
gameRecap.excerpt: The Raptors defeated the Heat, 121-97. Gary Trent Jr. led the way for the Raptors with a season-high 28 points (8-9 3pt. FG), while RJ Barrett added 26 points and eight rebounds in the victory. Jimmy Butler tallied 16 points, five rebounds and five assists for the Heat in the losing effort. The Raptors snap a 4-game losing streak as they improve to 16-25 on the season, while the Heat fall to 24-17.
